priorVersion.title: CDISC CDASH Vital Signs Position of Subject Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78431

self.title: CDISC CDASH Vital Signs Position of Subject Terminology

definition: A terminology subset of the CDISC SDTM Position codelist created for CDASH Vital Signs Position of Subject codelist. (NCI)
name: Vital Signs Position of Subject
preferredTerm: CDISC CDASH Vital Signs Position of Subject Terminology

terms.definition: The state or act of one who sits; the posture of one who occupies a seat. (NCI)
The act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position. (NCI)
A posterior recumbent body position whereby the person lies on its back and faces upward. (NCI)
